_header: Harkeneth all old and young / I rede ye think not here so long
_description: Gospel ‘In festo Sancti Andree’, in ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Herkeneþ alle Olde and ȝongeI rede ȝe þinke not
                    her so longe…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…þer as þe holye Apostles beAMEN AMEN alle sigge we.
                    AMEN.

BLAdd22283.First Lines:
HErkeneþ alle old and ȝongeI rede ȝe þinke not
                    here to longe…
BLAdd22283.Last Lines:
…Þer as þe holy Aposltes beAmen amen alle sigge we.
                    Amen
